titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, with respect to vehicle weight limitations in North Dakota, and for other purposes.
To amend title 23, United States Code, with respect to vehicle weight limitations in North Dakota, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
This bill exempts from federal-aid highway vehicle weight limitations a vehicle operating on a segment of the Interstate System in North Dakota if it:
has a gross vehicle weight of 129,000 pounds or less; complies with certain single axle, tandem axle, and bridge formula weight limits; and is authorized to operate on such segment under North Dakota law.
